comment: I enjoyed his class at first but he grades very hard on the reading responses which are due every week unless there is a project. If you do not respond to all the material he will take off points. He is not very good with responding to emails outside of class either. So if you need to reach him the best time would be to speak with him in class.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: Gentile is the type of professor that challenges & intimidates you, but he is also the type of professor you learn the most from. Has high expectations for all of his students and pushes you to meet them. Yeats unit, which is his favorite, so he is very specific and critical during that. Paper at end of class that is optional but do it to get an A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Inspirational

comment: Dr. Gentile is the best professor I had last semester. He is very knowledgeable and transmits his passion to the class. Just be sure to do all the assignments right, read instructions and be very careful with details. He will be happy to help if you need it.
Dr. Gentile is an amazing professor! he knows everything about everything but you had better come to class prepared. Lots of work but he will help you when you need it
